languages.text: "Грех осуждения еще посещает мою душу. Путь к избавлению будет долог".
"The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."
languages.original_text: "Грех осуждения еще посещает мою душу. Путь к избавлению будет долог".

traits.locale_text: "The sin of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."
"The sin of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."
"The sin of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."
"The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."

languages.text: “过去的罪孽依然在折磨我的灵魂，救赎之路将会无比漫长。”
languages.original_text: "The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."

traits.locale_text: “过去的罪孽依然在折磨我的灵魂，救赎之路将会无比漫长。”

languages.text: «La trampa de la condena aún mancha mi alma. El camino de la redención será largo, sin duda».
languages.original_text: "The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."

traits.locale_text: «El pecado de la condena aún mancha mi alma. El camino de la redención será largo, sin duda».

languages.text: 「断罪の罪は未だ我が魂にあり。贖罪の道は果てしなく長い」
languages.original_text: "The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."

traits.locale_text: 「断罪の罪は未だ我が魂にあり。贖罪の道は果てしなく長い」

languages.text: « Mon âme est toujours hantée par les fers de la condamnation. Le chemin de la rédemption sera long. »
languages.original_text: "The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."

traits.locale_text: « Mon âme est toujours habitée par le péché de condamnation. Le chemin de la rédemption sera long. »

languages.text: "Die Falle der Verdammnis sucht noch immer meine Seele heim. Der Weg zur Erlösung wird lang und beschwerlich."
languages.original_text: "The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sünde der Verdammnis sucht noch immer meine Seele heim. Der Weg zur Erlösung wird lang und beschwerlich."

languages.text: "Cezam, ruhumda silinemeyen izler bıraktı. Kefaretimin yolculuğu çok uzun olacak."
languages.original_text: "The snare of condemnation still visits my soul. The road to redemption will be long."
